rows.label: tlk70000057_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Auntie Rynea has really pretty hair.
And it smells good, too!

rows.label: tlk70000057_04_msg0002
rows.name:
She uses flower oil and good-smelling
water to make her hair all shiny.

rows.label: tlk70000057_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Mamma says I mustn't copy her, but
she never said how come...

rows.label: tlk70000057_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Grown-ups are always telling you
what you can't do. Well, I'm never
gonna be like that. Not ever!
